class concord.resources.models.Resource(id, owner_content_type, owner_object_id, foundational_permission_enabled, governing_permission_enabled, name)¶
exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

State Changes¶

Client¶

class concord.resources.client.ResourceClient(actor=None, target=None, system=False)¶

The target of a resource client, if a target is required, is always a resource model. As with all Concord clients, a target must be set for all methods not explicitly grouped as target-less methods.
